This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS mouse pointerevent boundary events in capturing 
PASS PointerEvent Automation 
PASS mouse pointer events boundary events when receiving capture 
PASS mouse pointer events boundary events when releasing capture 
PASS touch pointerevent boundary events in capturing 
PASS touch pointer events boundary events when receiving capture 
PASS touch pointer events boundary events when releasing capture 
PASS pen pointerevent boundary events in capturing 
PASS pen pointer events boundary events when receiving capture 
PASS pen pointer events boundary events when releasing capture 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
